State Regulations

Appendices A and B are model environmental assessment forms
that may be used to help satisfy this Part or may be modified in accordance
with sections
617.2
and
617.14
of this Part. Image

Amended

New

York State Register July 18, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 29, eff. 1/1/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
